description.p: Warding Flame: While this staff is on your person, you have advantage on initiative rolls. Each time you hit an enemy with a fire spell cast through this staff you deal an additional 2(1d4) fire damage. The staff can also be used as a magic quarterstaff.

Attuned Ownership: This staff, once attuned, will only answer to one person. If anyone, other than the staff's owner, touches Fatemaker it will heat up and deal 4 fire damage. This damage increases to 2d8 fire if anyone other than the rightful owner tries to use the staff. This damage is not applied if another person is struck by Fatemaker in melee combat.
Enhancement: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this staff. Also, it grants a +1 to your spell attack bonus and spell save DC.
This staff gains power when you reach level 8 and becomes Rulebreaker.
Rulebreaker is the form Chainbreaker takes when it increases in rarity from uncommon to rare.

This damage increases to 2d8 fire if anyone other than the rightful owner tries to use the staff. This damage is not applied if another person is struck by Fatemaker in melee combat.
Smoke: You know the spell Shadow Armor and may use it once per day without spending a spell slot.
Enhancement: You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this staff. Also, it grants a +2 to your spell attack bonus and spell save DC.
This staff gains power when you reach level 12 and becomes Dawnbringer.
Dawnbringer is the form Rulebreaker takes when it increases in rarity from rare to very rare.

Fire: Once per day you may activate your Mantle of Flame through this staff in addition to your normal uses of the power.

This staff gains power when you reach level 16 and becomes Fatemaker.
Fatemaker is the form Dawnbringer takes when it increases in rarity from very rare to legendary.

Warding Flame: While this staff is on your person, you have advantage on initiative rolls. Each time you hit an enemy with a fire spell cast through this staff you deal an additional 7(2d6) fire damage. The staff can also be used as a magic quarterstaff.

Attuned Ownership: This staff, once attuned, will only answer to one person. If anyone, other than the staff's owner, touches Fatemaker it will heat up and deal 4 fire damage. This damage increases to 2d8 fire if anyone other than the rightful owner tries to use the staff. This damage is not applied if another person is struck by Fatemaker in melee combat.
Smoke: You know the spell Shadow Armor and may use it once per day without spending a spell slot.
Fire: Once per day you may activate your Mantle of Flame through this staff in addition to your normal uses of the power.

Wreath of Flame: Once per day, Fatemaker can Wreath itself in Flames for 10 minutes or until you banish them. These flames do no harm to you or your possessions. While this power is active, any fire spell you cast deals an additional 2 dice of damage (based on the spell's damage die type).

Legendary Attunement: Your connection to this staff strengthens your ability to attune to magical items. You can now be attuned to a maximum of four magical items, rather than the normal limit of three.
Enhancement: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this staff. Also, it grants a +3 to your spell attack bonus and spell save DC.
